articles.author: Scott Roxborough
articles.title: ‘Emilia Pérez’ Wins Big at European Film Awards - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The film's star Karla Sofía Gascón made history as the first trans actress to take Europe's best actress honor, with Jacques Audiard winning best director and best screenplay as well as best film.
articles.content:
Emilia Pérez got an early boost in its awards campaign on Saturday night by cleaning up at the 37th European Film Awards, handed out in Lucerne, Switzerland. 
Jacques Audiard’s Spanish-language tran… [+8804 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Two European satellites launch on mission to blot out the Sun—for science - Ars Technica
articles.description: This will all happen nearly 40,000 miles above the Earth, so you won’t need your eclipse glasses.
